website_summaries.verdict: Jabra's Revo headphones favor over-the-top bass boosting rather than a balanced sound signature. And they cost a bit more than they should.
pros: Powerful, clean audio response with extremely boosted bass for low frequency lovers
Inline remote control and microphone for Android and iOS devices
Excellent design and construction with cloth-bound, tangle-resistant, detachable cable
cons: Extremely unrealistic sound signature favors bass heavily over high-mids and highs
Overpriced for this level of sound quality
Can be uncomfortable over long listening periods

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product exceed my expectation!
customer_reviews.text: Compare to its price, the sound is incredible! The bass is really impressive, I have to say it totally compete all my existing head phones and earbuds, including Sennheiser HD598, Denon D1100. The bass is strong but still clear and fast, it won’t mess everything up, you could still hear the details. However, the mid and high is just average. I can’t find any defect though. There is one thing I would like to mention, never ever wear it during a workout! The control on the cord is not water-proof! All in all, this is a great head phone if you like bass very much!
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I received the package in perfect condition. The sound is crisp and clear, with a medium to low bass, just the way I like it. The headphones are sturdy and they feel well build. Since it is the first time I am wearing them, you can get the feeling of rigidity, putting a little pressure on your ears. It does not bother me since I am sure that in time they will loosen up. Other than that I feel them really comfortable, no problem with overheating my ears. I like the yellow cable, looks funky and the jacks feel good quality. I would definitely recommend them! :D
customer_reviews.author: Mihaita Iulian

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, bad cord and app quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these a few months ago. Was thrilled by the packaging and initial experiences with the headphones. But soon I realised that the Dolby app for Android glitches in the middle of the songs and after 2 months of very careful usage the "tested 15 kg cable" has been broken inside around the control box. Such that the mic and the buttons are not working anymore and foreign noises can be heard in the headphones from time to time. Also some part is moving inside the band, which is probably not good neither. Beside the quality of the app and the cord, I like the sound of these headphones and the foldable design is quite good.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: Love this headset. The construction is very sturdy and feels high quality. The ability to switch the cord from ear to ear due to the port on each ear is super nice as well. I'm no sound tech but the sound on these is great. It does seem to do better with pop/electronic music due to the bass rather then orchestral music.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Above average headphones you will not regret buying them
customer_reviews.text: I use these in the office and they are great. I listen to classical music, rock and some hip-hop... Good build quality. After 2H or so my ears start to warm up (which is good since i wear them pretty tight) Overall I love them! they look awesome, sounds more then great and folds up so i can take them with me =)
customer_reviews.author: Ehud Shkalim

customer_reviews.title: Quality meets aesthetic
customer_reviews.text: I like: Quality is the first thing you notice when you grab the headphone. It's a modern and beautiful design. Portable. It's sounds loud, very generous about that. Isolation works well for both in and out leakage, unless you're in a very quiet environment. What i don't like: Heavy bass, which i didn't expect. That's the only negative point for me, if you're a bass lover it's positive for you.
customer_reviews.author: Efe Dindar

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, comfortable and great sound
customer_reviews.text: Stylish, comfortable and great sound. It really picks up the bass compared to some other headphones. It fits on the ear and is very comfortable compared to other on the ear headphones. The longest I wore it on so far is about an hour continuously and there was no discomfort at all, no numbness or pinching of the ears.
customer_reviews.author: C.Hart

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful headphones. Used them for the first time while ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful headphones. Used them for the first time while I was in transit from Los Angeles to Philadelphia and back. Truly impressed with the sound quality. A+
customer_reviews.author: Salaam RHD

customer_reviews.title: They're okay...
customer_reviews.text: The design is awesome but they don't have that really good quality other people say about in their reviews. They're not bad, but not even amazing. Just normal. Returned to Amazon because I can't spend 90$ for headphone which are just well-looking (same for Beats)
customer_reviews.author: Punifier

customer_reviews.title: Best Deal for the Money
customer_reviews.text: amazing price for such a quality made pair of headphones. Work great with Dolby Digital-Plus, even downloaded the app to my iPhone for better sound! They sound really great on Amazon Kindle Fire HDX 8.9", like sitting in a theater.
customer_reviews.author: biggy schmalz

customer_reviews.title: Fast Delivery
customer_reviews.text: The product it good. I read a lot of reviews on this before buying so I knew what to expect. And it is as I expected. I am in Ghana and so I was concerned about how quickly I would received my item. But I have to say I got the item in 12 days which is not bad considering the destination (Ghana). So to all my Ghanaian friends out there who are thinking of delivery, I can confidently say you assured of getting the item and getting it in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Wurah

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product
customer_reviews.text: These things are built to last. Excellent quality construction and wonderful sound quality. This is one of my best purchases of the year and I am considering it as a gift for others.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Shaffer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, easy to pack.
customer_reviews.text: .Good sound, like the switchable/sharable cord location option, understand the storage bag stronger than it looks (weighs next to nothing) and packs easily.
customer_reviews.author: JSteil

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, but a little too bassy
customer_reviews.text: To me, these sound better than Beats and are ruggedly built. They fit well on my large head and I can leave then on for hours. The only setback is they are a bit too bassy for my taste.
customer_reviews.author: A. Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Being that I have gotten a pair of Jabra's for my husband and son, I expected more. The volume keys do not work on the headset and after 2 days the little metal piece above the ear started sliding down. Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really nice sounding headphones and great price. Jack in right and left side.
customer_reviews.author: SWB

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!, Real Steal for the price!!!.
customer_reviews.text: When I first used them was connected to my Laptop, they sounded horrible, but then when I tried them with my phone amazing full sound. Make sure you connect this to a good audio source, seems like some laptops audio Jacks dont output good audio quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ismael Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Solid On-ear Headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty fantastic. I've listened to Beats and these are comparable in sound quality. They've got a good bass presence without losing the highs. The bass does give the music a darker profile than I was used to with my iPhone earbuds, but these are still great headphones.
customer_reviews.author: kimberlym

customer_reviews.title: First one was for work but liked them enough to buy a second set for home
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair i've bought. First one was for work but liked them enough to buy a second set for home.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Lau

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones, not great
customer_reviews.text: Good headphones, not great, comfortable, folding, solid cord+mic and not too long, as for the sound- has nice bass but highs are a little screeching. Overall good headphones but my opinion is you can get better sound for the same price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: As Tony the Tiger say their great thanks Jabra & Amazon
customer_reviews.author: DA

customer_reviews.title: Like wearing pillows on your ears
customer_reviews.text: I wear these eight hours a day at work. I needed something comfortable, with a good strong cord. These have good sound, and you can put the cord on either ear cup. They fold up , and come with a drawstring bag, (which I like because its easier to throw in my bag verses a hard case) if you need a good pair of headphones that can take a beating, these are the ones.
customer_reviews.author: k-redd

customer_reviews.title: dont buy
customer_reviews.text: stopped working after 6 months of normal use. Jabra consumer impossible to contact for warranty claim.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: The only con's was that I ordered two pairs Gray Black like the pic and I got one pair Gray Black ...
customer_reviews.text: Shipment was ultra fast and product meet the expectations. The only con's was that I ordered two pairs Gray Black like the pic and I got one pair Gray Black an second pair Gray White.
customer_reviews.author: Gil

customer_reviews.title: Not to bad.
customer_reviews.text: They fit and sound perfect but do not control the volume on my Samsung note 4.
customer_reviews.author: Sean ORourke

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality and balance
customer_reviews.text: Good sound quality and balance. The ears are not in the best position agains the headphones which create a little pain due to the continous pressure on it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good sound but not so comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The sound is quite good, but they are not as comfortable as expected (especially if you wear glasses).
customer_reviews.author: N.

customer_reviews.title: and sound not so good as expected
customer_reviews.text: too small, and sound not so good as expected. But nice design, and microphone make this headphones good enough for mobile devices
customer_reviews.author: Nikita Rubilov

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Good build quality and excellent sound, as expected. Not too bassy for me. Received last week no any cons discovered yet.
customer_reviews.author: Rafayel

customer_reviews.title: ... again this have more bass and sound louder simply better and cheaper
customer_reviews.text: If ur thinking about buying beats solo 1 or 2 think again this have more bass and sound louder simply better and cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: HELLISHMATRIX

customer_reviews.title: hell yeah!!!
customer_reviews.text: Super fast shipping, product was exactly as advertised. Very happy with my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very quick delivery, the phones arrived unharmed , and they work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect for me!
customer_reviews.text: Just perfect headphones for me. Sound quality 5/5. Can be used while working out or while listening music from pc.
customer_reviews.author: Marko

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable even after wearing them for 3 hours straight. Wish the cordless version is as affordable...
customer_reviews.author: Li-san

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product, particularly with Softphone VoIP applications. Sound quality is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Henry H. Ku

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: I've tried other headphones and these are the best. I would recommend Jabra to anyone interested in considering a pair of headphones,
customer_reviews.author: Donald J Jones

customer_reviews.title: Average sound but painful listening
customer_reviews.text: Had big expectations after getting to know the review from CNET. Sound is average and seriously feel like there are other better products coming for a lesser price. Biggest drawback of this headphone is its inability to swivel horizontally. The headphones apply too much pressure on the ears and is painful to bear even for 5 mins. This might be personal but did not work for me at all. Overall a very good design though
customer_reviews.author: Robin Koshy

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Great set of can, for a very reasonable price! No need to get gouged by the BIG names out there...
customer_reviews.author: Chase

customer_reviews.title: Retail Price Too Expensive
customer_reviews.text: So... Bottom line I would never pay $200 for this. $50 was a good bargain and the headphones weren't as noise-isolating as I thought it was. Bled a lot of noise when in high volumes.Compared to a Beats Solo HD, the beats bled significantly less. Also the cords weren't as red as I thought and they were more 'pink'. But comfort and look wise and price wise, I would choose Jabra over beats anyday. Undeniably stylish too. It'll do the job on the subway.
customer_reviews.author: Eddo Williams Hintoso

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love these headphones
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these headphones! I use them for everything! I would recommend them to a friend and anyone looking for wirless headphones. I would not say these are over the ear headphones though. They are more of on ear headphones. When you workout with them it may be a little uncomfortable depending on the size of ears you have. Because when you sweat the leather feels very weird and uncomfortable. The sound quality is great! If you are looking for headphones with a lot of bass then they aren't for you. But the mids are flawless and after doing some adjustments with the app you can get them right where you desire them.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: In love
customer_reviews.text: I bought it a month ago and I'm really surprised with this headphone. The sound is awesome, I absolute love to listen to music with them. I can hear every detail, the bass is also really great. Before I chose the Jabra Revo Corded I researched a lot, I compared with others brands (e.g., Beats Dr. Dre), read as much reviews as I could here in Amazon and others websites. Finally, I chose this amazing headphones, first because the build quality is strong (better than Beats that is just fashionable in my view) and the sound quality is really good.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Vilella

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headphones
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality materials and build, the music sound amazing, with very good bass, and the included cable works with my ipod nano 6th gen. You can fold it for travel, it includes a bag thats ok. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Guillermo Esterovich

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headphones
customer_reviews.text: Awesome headphones, especially for the price. I did a test with these and compared them to Beats by Dre (Solo HD version). They were extremely close in sound and comfort. I actually think these are more comfortable than the beats. For the price, I will take these over beats any day.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC
customer_reviews.text: I've had these headphones for quite sometime and I absolutely love them. Along with great sound and solid build quality they're also unique. The only downside to the product is the built in mic on the cord barely works with anything. Not really an issue with my own personal use but just a precaution for those out their shopping.
customer_reviews.author: Isaiah Underhill

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of gear
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Jabra product, and there is a pattern here - they seem to be well thought out products with excellent initial quality. Longevity is too early to tell. The headphone has outstanding sound, and over-the-ear fit is great. Appears well-built as well.
customer_reviews.author: LazyShopper

customer_reviews.title: Nice design, performs great as expected
customer_reviews.text: Experience consistent with other reviews: well designed, nice packaging, looks good, good sound quality. Compared side by side with the new $199 Beats, the iPhone speaking quality of the Jabra is better, but the family preferred the Beat music sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Indrajit G

customer_reviews.title: great headphone !!!
customer_reviews.text: Just as its advertisement sells, a great headset and awesome sound quality! It's very sturdy made with aluminum metallic overhead arms and super durable with impact. Definitely worth of your money. One of the best I got on Amazon with the decent price.
customer_reviews.author: TYLER WUCHUNTA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for office use
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful for use in the office, audio is loud and clean, sits comfortably on my ears; and the fact that i got it "used like new" from amazon warehouse deals (saved about 25%) makes it even more enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Holder

customer_reviews.title: never liked over the ear headphones at the gym
customer_reviews.text: never liked over the ear headphones at the gym, but for that price this one sounds great use it on Legs day.
customer_reviews.author: Rayan A.

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: I actually have two pairs of these, one Bluetooth and one not. I keep a pair at work so I can listen to my music and one at home. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Bartron

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: If everyone who has beats got to try out these headphones and made the name of Jabra Revo more known, they would be selling better than beats. These are the greatest music headphones I've ever used, and I bought them when they were $200. I would still pay $200 for them even though these are now under $100.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughters thoroughly enjoy these! actually surprised on the sound quality... Good job Jabra!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonJunkie

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: For the price I like this headphone. I would say best sound quality for any music.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Sin

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty good... I wish the cary case was a bit better
customer_reviews.author: Waqar Khan

customer_reviews.title: very good product
customer_reviews.text: the second pair I bought for my grown up children , both praise the balanced and clear sound for different types of music. Not for extra bass fans.
customer_reviews.author: A. C.

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Great sound tested beats the equivalent or better and build you can't compare
customer_reviews.author: Cullen216

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones. So much more bang for buck compared to Beats.
customer_reviews.author: Mai Dang

customer_reviews.title: Only last 1 year.
customer_reviews.text: Love these headphones. Very comfortable. Bought a second pair for work. Will probably buy a 3rd pair. I typically listen to music through my phone. The controls on the cord are nice for adjusting volume and pausing/playing. The cord can be attached to the left or right ear can. Update: 1 year later both pair of headphones stopped working. Built-in obsolescence... No reason two pair of headphones should fail after the same amount of time. Used one pair at work and one pair at home.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: bought as a gift and she said they are great
customer_reviews.author: Michelle M.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: a little bit small and tight for my small ear.
customer_reviews.author: jianping wu

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sound awesome! Look very sturdy and I love the detachable cord.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine S. Smedley

customer_reviews.title: ... quality of the materials used in the earphones is good, but the overall fit hurt my ears and ...
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the materials used in the earphones is good, but the overall fit hurt my ears and I was so not impressed with the sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Maurice Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product but the in-line remote is not easy to use as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Romero Edwards

product_meta.title: Jabra REVO Corded Stereo Headphones - Retail Packaging - White (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
product_meta.description:
PLUG IN AND EXPERIENCE THE POWER WITH JABRA REVO. The perfect companion for your device - Jabra Revo enhances your experience with convenient features and optimized sound. Play or pause music, skip tracks and take calls with ease by using controls located on the cord instead of searching around for your phone. We partnered with Dolby to bring you Dolby Digital Plus via our Jabra Sound app, which provides a rich, full-spectrum sound that brings your device to life and adds extra depth and dimension to your music. Designed to be used and abused, Revo is solidly built with aluminum and steel construction, a shatterproof, ultra-flexible headband and reinforced, fabric cables. Drop, bend, fold and cable-tested to the max to ensure they can take whatever life has in store.Experience super comfort with Revo’s padded headband and plush, memory foam ear cups. It also fFeatures two jack connectors so you can share music or films with a friend and a foldable design for quick, compact storage so can throw it in your bag and go.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


PLUG IN AND EXPERIENCE THE POWER WITH JABRA REVO
REASONS TO CHOOSE JABRA REVO
 * High definition Dolby Digital Plus enhanced sound
 * Unrivaled durability – plug it in and go
 * In-line controls to easily manage calls and tracks

PLUG IN AND GO
The perfect companion for your device - Jabra Revo enhances your experience with convenient features and optimized sound. Play or pause your music, skip tracks and take calls with ease by using in-line controls instead of searching around for your phone. Hear and be heard with superior call quality.

MASSIVE SOUND
Jabra partnered with Dolby to bring you powerful, mobile sound enhanced by Dolby Digital Plus. With Jabra’s exclusive Sound App, Dolby Digital Plus provides rich, full-spectrum sound that brings your device to life and adds extra depth and dimension to your music.

ULTIMATE DURABILITY
Designed to be used and abused, Revo is solidly built with aluminum and steel construction, a shatterproof, ultraflexible headband and reinforced, fabric cables. Drop, bend, fold and cable-tested to the max to ensure they can take whatever life has in store.

COMFORT & EASE OF USE
Experience super comfort with Revo’s padded headband and plush, memory foam ear cups. Featuring two jack connectors so you can share music or films with a friend and a foldable design for quick, compact storage so can throw it in your bag and go.

EXCLUSIVE JABRA SOUND APP
Get an enhanced music experience with the Jabra Sound App – a music player that gives you the full Dolby Digital Plus sound and more. Use the App to create and browse through playlists, share music and adjust the graphic equalizer so you can play your tracks as you want to hear them.

MUSIC & CHAT
Adjust your music the way you like it, or easily switch to an incoming call.

 * Pause/play music* Tap the multi-function button
 * Speaker volume** Tap the volume + or volume - button
 * Answer/end call* Tap the multi-function button. Music will automatically pause
 * Reject call* Press and hold (2 secs) the multi-function button
 * Redial last number* Double-tap the multi-function button
 * Skip track forward/backward* Double-tap the multi-function button to skip track forward. Triple-tap the multi-function button to skip track backwards

* Phone dependent
** Apple devices only

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
Jabra Revo headphones, protective bag, quick start guide

FEATURES AND SPECIFICATIONS
 * High definition Dolby Digital Plus enhanced sound via exclusive Jabra Sound App
 * Optimized sound excellence with portable devices
 * In-line controls for easy music and call management
 * Life proof - tough, shatterproof and constructed for ultimate portability
 * Extreme tested: cable (to 15 kg), bend ( 10000 times), Fold (3500 times), Drop (from 2 m)
 * Premium materials: Tangle-free, fabric cables reinforced with Liquid Crystal Polymer, synthetic titanium headband (lightweight and flexible), steel hinges and aluminum frame
 * Foldable design for quick and easy storage
 * Premium comfort for extended wear: memory foam ear cups and padded headband
 * Superior call quality – hear and be heard
 * Dual 3.5 mm jack connectors – plug in on your preferred side and share your music
 * Connects with all devices with a 3.5 mm jack connector – phones, computers, tablets and more

view larger
feature_bullets: Jabra Sound app provides High Definition Dolby Digital Plus enhanced sound
Unrivaled durability -bend tested and made for use while on the go
Controls on the cord to easily manage music and phone calls
Two jack connectors for sharing music or videos with a friend
Memory foam ear cups and padded headband for long term comfort
